## PointerProxy.setPointer() method

Sets the underlying pointer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setPointer(p: Pointer<O>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p | Pointer&lt;O&gt; | The pointer to be proxied. |
